(Construction package LMNHP-EW-Il-(WB)-1) under LMNHP" observed regarding non-implementation of Ministry of Environment and Forest Notification No. SO763(E) dated 4.09.1999 , aS amended from time to time, which mandated compulsory Use of fly ash in roads construction within a radius Of 100 Km of & thermal power plant.
